column2: an A.M. Eatery////Been to Snooze a couple of times now. Unless you come pretty early in the morning
column3: you're almost guaranteed to wait at least 45 minutes. However
column4: I would say it's definitely worth the wait at least once. Great brunch spot on Montrose. Lots of different options for food...egg plates
column8: and lots more. My favorite dish has been the hash so far. Lots of food and great fillings. The pancakes have also been a favorite..ask about their daily pancake!
